description:
1. Create am image which is in saving state for ever

Procedure to create an image which stays in saving state for ever
a. Create a vm
b. take a snapshot
c while the snapshot is in saving state delete the vm

2. Create an VM from HP standard image wat till its active.
3. Rebuild the VM with the image in saving state (created by above procedure)
Observation: VM stays in rebuild/pending state for ever
4. Rebuild the instance with a good/active/HP provided standard image

Observation: Instance still stays in pending state and never comes to active
title: Delete while snapshotting: VM Stays in rebuild state forever
